amendment.description: Amendment expresses the sense of Congress that military aviation training in Colorado, including the training conducted at the High-Altitude Army National Guard Aviation Training Site, is critical to the national security of the United States and the readiness of the Armed Forces.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 375 printed in Part B of House Report 116-413 to express the sense of Congress that military aviation training in Colorado, including the training conducted at the High-Altitude Army National Guard Aviation Training Site, is critical to the national security of the United States and the readiness of the Armed Forces.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tipton amendment (A046) Agreed to by recorded vote: 417 - 6 (Roll no. 461).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Tipton amendment (A046) Agreed to by recorded vote: 417 - 6 (Roll no. 461).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A046) offered by Mr. Tipton.
